text: Dimaadua gu hagau ana daangada kae hegau mono soukohp belee agoago gi nia daangada Israel mo Judah boloo: “Goodou gi diagia godou haihai huaidu, gi hagalongo mai gi agu helekai, di hagahonu nnaganoho dela ne wanga go Au gi godou maadua mmaadua, ge gu gowadu gi goodou mai baahi agu gau hai hegau go nia soukohp.”
